Posts.Content: My Wife who is 47 years old and still menstruating is dignosed to have lymphnode negative early stage Breast cancer. She has opted for Modified Radical Mastectomy.  Histopathologically the Tumour was high grade with size of tumour around 2.5X2.5X 3 Cms. The tumour was ER Negative, Pr Positive and CHRe2 Negative. I am intrested in knowing what would be best adjuvent Chemotherapy for her. Doses and Number of Cycles?
Posts.Title: treatment
